short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom button creator, now works with any text field in SMAX.  Queue updater and audible alert, when new case is found.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables the user to create custom buttons for use in cases within Salesforce.
Now updated to work with any field in SMAX!

New feature includes the queue updater.  A lightweight queue refresher, which will work in the background and alert you to a new case!

3.2 Added the ability to receive email notification

3.5 Redesigned popover page, added the ability to mute cases
